github_projects.name: This Website!
github_projects.desc: this website is open source! i plan on adding a bunch to it :)

github_projects.name: CNE Debug Addon
github_projects.desc: Addon to speed up / slow down game, skip time, botplay, etc.

github_projects.name: CNE Mod Organizer
github_projects.desc: Codename addon to add slight mod organization in ModSwitchMenu

github_projects.name: Funkin Java
github_projects.desc: Friday Night Funkin' recreation in Java, for a school project!

github_projects.name: Github Splash
github_projects.desc: Small thing to make my Github page look better, heavy WIP

github_projects.name: Wizard Mania
github_projects.desc: Outdated FNF input system recreation, simply made to learn

github_projects.name: Wizard Engine
github_projects.desc: Friday Night Funkin' recreation in the Godot game engine to learn Godot!

github_projects.name: SMB1 in Celeste
github_projects.desc: i learned how to mod celeste LMAO

github_projects.name: CNE SiivaGunner
github_projects.desc: Codename modpack with a few siivagunner rips ported, very outdated and was used to test codename engine

github_projects.name: Online VS Assets Archive
github_projects.desc: Archive to store assets / FLAs for Online VS! in case anything happens

github_projects.name: [Outdated] Average4K Documentation
github_projects.desc: Made before Kade wrote his own documentation for his game lol

funkin_projects.name: VS Tabi
funkin_projects.desc: I coded about 80% of the mod, this was super fun man

funkin_projects.name: VS Raven
funkin_projects.desc: I made the UI! that's about it tho i didn't do much else

funkin_projects.name: BROADCASTED BLOOD
funkin_projects.desc: Solo-coded and charted the entire mod, I'm insanely proud of this one

funkin_projects.name: OSC: Christmas Special
funkin_projects.desc: Coded ~80% of the mod, has 5 completely unique songs and was entirely made in about 3 weeks

funkin_projects.name: back2back
funkin_projects.desc: Scrapped mod! Solo-coded the entire thang with a bunch of songs :(

funkin_projects.name: YTP Invasion
funkin_projects.desc: Helped a bunch in the backend! Extremely song-packed mod, couldn't of done it without the hella talented people!

funkin_projects.name: Super Fcuking Mario
funkin_projects.desc: yes it's spelled like that. Anywho i charted it but next update i'll code it :D

funkin_projects.name: Saster's Bday Mod
funkin_projects.desc: Side coder for more intricate bits! actual mod isn't public so the link is a showcase.

funkin_projects.name: Soules DX
funkin_projects.desc: Main coder! Mod got leaked tho :( but there is a whole website which is cool!

funkin_projects.name: VS Irene
funkin_projects.desc: Solo-coded all 22 song like a frickin champ dude this one was TOUGH :sob:

funkin_projects.name: NG Throwdown
funkin_projects.desc: Solo-coded this 4 song wonder, one of my fondest mods cuz i really pushed myself while being stupid as hell lol

funkin_projects.name: VS Kotone
funkin_projects.desc: Solo-coded and charted this 3 hour one-shot mod! Literally everything was made in 3 hours it was brutal.

funkin_projects.name: No Lavender
funkin_projects.desc: Coded a joke mod for StickyBM, the mod is unfortunately taken down :(

funkin_projects.name: VS Leaf
funkin_projects.desc: Solo-coded and charted this in 3-4 hours! This is the third 3-hour mod we made

funkin_projects.name: The Impossible Trio
funkin_projects.desc: Charted a crazy hard song that was seen by sillyfangirlosu, still an incredibly fond memory :D

funkin_projects.name: VS Tomska
funkin_projects.desc: Solo-coded and charted this mod! Was made with a 3 hour time limit (again).

funkin_projects.name: Rift Shredder
funkin_projects.desc: Coded and charted! A contender for one of the funniest mods i've ever seen this song is insane to relisten to

funkin_projects.name: VS Adam
funkin_projects.desc: Charted 3 songs. The first mod I've ever worked on.
